game

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Field

  • public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    A single field on a board.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wouter Bezemer, Wiljan Vinke

    • Field Detail

      • DIM

        public static final int DIM
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Field

        public Field()
        Creates an empty Field which has 5 slots: The 4 Ring sizes and a 5th slot which determines if the Field is occupied by a base. Each Field starts empty and null. Also keeps track of a boolean for each color which shows if they can play on this field. Has a 4x5 matrix of doubles which show the value of playing on this field for each color and size ring.

    • Method Detail

      • placeRing

        public void placeRing(Color color,
                      Size size,
                      Player player)
        Places a Ring in a certain slot in this Field. Checks whether the Field is free, the Player has that Ring and there is no base of a same Color in an adjacent Field. After the move is successful the Ring gets removed from the Player and all neighboring Fields are set to be playable for this Color.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color of the Ring to place
        size - The Size of the Ring to place
        player - The Player that wants to play a Ring

      • placeStart

        public void placeStart()
        Places the starting base on this field and makes all adjacent fields playable for all colors.

      • isLegal

        public boolean isLegal(Color color,
                       Size size,
                       Player player)
        Check if the given move is allowed by the game rules.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color of the Ring to place
        size - The Size of the Ring to place
        player - The Player that wants to play a Ring
        Returns:
        True if the move is allowed

      • getRing

        public Ring getRing(Size size)
        Returns the Ring in a certain slot of this Field.
        Parameters:
        size - The Size needed to check
        Returns:
        The Ring of the given Size or null if empty

      • playable

        public boolean playable(Color color)
        Checks whether the given Color is allowed to play on this Field.
        Returns:
        True if the given Color Rings can be placed on this Field

      • setPlayable

        public void setPlayable(Color color)
        Sets the Field to be playable for the given Color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color which will now be playable on this Field

      • getValue

        public double getValue(Color color,
                       Size size)
        Checks what the value for playing on this Field is for the given Color and Size Ring.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color of the spot
        size - The Size of the spot
        Returns:
        The value for playing on this spot

      • setValue

        public void setValue(Color color,
                     Size size,
                     java.lang.Double value)
        Sets a value for playing on this Field for the given Color and Size.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color of the spot
        size - The Size of the spot
        value - The value for playing on this Field

      • getAdjacent

        public java.util.Set<Field> getAdjacent()
        Checks which Fields are adjacent to this Field.
        Returns:
        A set of Fields who are next to this one

      • setAdjacent

        public void setAdjacent(java.util.Set<Field> fields)
        Sets which Fields are adjacent to this Field.
        Parameters:
        fields - A set of Fields

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the whole Field is empty and a base can be placed.
        Returns:
        true if there are no Rings on this Field

      • hasBase

        public boolean hasBase()
        Checks if the Field has a base.
        Returns:
        true if the Field has a base on it

      • isEmptySlot

        public boolean isEmptySlot(Size size)
        Checks if the given size can be played here.
        Parameters:
        size - The Size needed to check
        Returns:
        true if the slot of the given size is empty

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Checks whether the whole Field is full.
        Returns:
        True if you cannot play on this Field anymore

      • owns

        public Color owns()
        Checks if a color holds a majority on this field.
        Returns:
        the color which holds a majority, returns null on a tie or if the field has a base

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the field and makes all rings null again.
